name: Quality: The Game
description:
Quality : The Game (early prototype/test ver)

a Cube is mad at his friend and wants to kill him whit silly weaponry like: fist and g  u  n

-quality the game

(warning: this game contains a lil bit of swearing, so like if u don't like that then just be blind idk, also this game isn't meant to be serious, if you didn't know bout it.)

This is a stupid Choose You're Adventure type game I did in 2 days, if you for some reason like this game (which probably you won't), leave me a comment on what you think about the game, you and you're "friend" Cuby are trying to kill this other long cube for some reason.
